laboratory_examinations.findings: Initial score: 34, improved by 35% after first course.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Score stabilized, with no change over the next several months.

laboratory_examinations.procedure_name: Scale for the Assessment of Positive Symptoms (SAPS)
laboratory_examinations.findings: Initial score: Not specified, improved by 30% in severity.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Score decreased from 38 to 16 after a new course of treatment, stabilized at 10 over the next 6 months.

laboratory_examinations.date: Day 1 and Day 2 of the study
laboratory_examinations.findings: Blood pressure on Day 1: 120–140/80–90; Day 2: 136/84; Pulse on Day 1: 68–82; Day 2: 84.
